text: The Poet and the Tsar () is a 1927 Soviet silent movie directed by Vladimir Gardin and Yevgeni Chervyakov.На экране и арене: тверские в цирковом искусстве и в киноВсе оставляя людям… It stars Yevgeni Chervyakov, Irina Volodko, and Konstantin Karenin. ==Actors== * Yevgeni Chervyakov as Alexander Pushkin * Irina Volodko as Natalya Pushkina * Konstantin Karenin as Nicholas I of Russia * Boris Tumarin as Baron d'Anthès * Leonid Tkachov as Pyotr Vyazemsky == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian silent movies Category:Russian biographical movies Category:1927 movies Category:1920s biographical movies Category:1920s historical movies Category:Movies set in Russia Category:Movies set in palaces Category:Movies set in the 19th century Category:Movies directed by Vladimir Gardin Category:Movies directed by Yevgeni Chervyakov
title: The Poet and the Tsar
